title: ‘I’m Afraid for My Future’: Proposed Laws Threaten Gay Life in Russia
description: The laws, all but assured of enactment, would intensify a crackdown on L.G.B.T.Q. freedom in Russia, which Vladimir V. Putin has cast as a corrosive Western influence.
dc:creator: Valerie Hopkins, Valeriya Safronova and Nanna Heitmann
media:credit: Nanna Heitmann for The New York Times
media:description: A drag show at a gay club in Moscow.
